name: ibuildio-template-semantic
description: Generic template based on semantic-ui framework with powerful npm based build scripts.

scripts.deploy:docs: [ ${GH_TOKEN} ] && npm run deploy:docs:travis -s || npm run deploy:docs:local -s
scripts.predeploy:docs: npm run build:docs -s && cd ${npm_package_config_dir_docs}_book && git init && git config user.name $npm_package_config_deploy_name && git config user.email $npm_package_config_deploy_email && git add -A . && git commit -am "$npm_package_config_deploy_message"
